gross_profit_margin.description: Revenue minus cost of goods sold as percentage of revenue

revenue_per_cost_dollar.name: Revenue per Cost Dollar
revenue_per_cost_dollar.description: Revenue generated per dollar of cost

expense_turnover.name: Expense Turnover
expense_turnover.description: Revenue generated per dollar of total expenses

food_cost_efficiency.name: Food Cost Efficiency
food_cost_efficiency.description: Food revenue generated per dollar of food cost

labor_cost_percentage.name: Labor Cost Percentage
labor_cost_percentage.description: Labor costs as percentage of total revenue

prime_cost_percentage.name: Prime Cost Percentage
prime_cost_percentage.description: Combined food and labor costs as percentage of revenue

variable_cost_percentage.name: Variable Cost Percentage
variable_cost_percentage.description: Variable costs (COGS) as percentage of revenue

food_revenue_mix.name: Food Revenue Mix
food_revenue_mix.description: Food revenue as percentage of total revenue

beverage_revenue_mix.name: Beverage Revenue Mix
beverage_revenue_mix.description: Beverage revenue as percentage of total revenue

high_margin_item_mix.name: High-Margin Item Mix
high_margin_item_mix.description: High-margin items (desserts + beverages) as percentage of revenue

breakeven_revenue.name: Break-even Revenue
breakeven_revenue.description: Monthly revenue needed to break even

cash_conversion_efficiency.name: Cash Conversion Efficiency
cash_conversion_efficiency.description: Operating profit as percentage of revenue (cash generation efficiency)

labor_productivity.name: Labor Productivity
labor_productivity.description: Revenue generated per dollar of labor cost
